properties.description: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.
properties.name: isValid

properties.description: The parent of the HTMLExportPreference (a Document).
properties.name: parent

properties.description: A collection of events.
properties.name: events

properties.description: A collection of event listeners.
properties.name: eventListeners

properties.description: If true and have selection, export selected content to HTML.
properties.name: exportSelection

properties.description: The export order.
properties.name: exportOrder

properties.description: The bullet export option.
properties.name: bulletExportOption

properties.description: The numbered list export option.
properties.name: numberedListExportOption

properties.description: If true, open docuemnt in viewer after export.
properties.name: viewDocumentAfterExport

properties.description: The export order.
properties.name: imageExportOption

properties.description: The export resolution
properties.name: imageExportResolution

properties.description: Allows user to select the image size option for conversion
properties.name: customImageSizeOption

properties.description: If true, format image based on layout appearence.
properties.name: preserveLayoutAppearence

properties.description: Alignment applied to images
properties.name: imageAlignment

properties.description: Space Before applied to images
properties.name: imageSpaceBefore

properties.description: Space After applied to images
properties.name: imageSpaceAfter

properties.description: apply image alignment to anchored object settings.
properties.name: applyImageAlignmentToAnchoredObjectSettings

properties.description: The file format to use for converted images. Note: Valid only when copy optimized images and/or copy formatted images is true.
properties.name: imageConversion

properties.description: The color palette for GIF conversion. Note: Not valid when image conversion is JPEG.
properties.name: gifOptionsPalette

properties.description: If true, generates interlaced GIFs. Note: Not valid  when image conversion is JPEG.
properties.name: gifOptionsInterlaced

properties.description: The quality of converted JPEG images. Note: Not valid when image conversion is GIF.
properties.name: jpegOptionsQuality

properties.description: The formatting method for converted JPEG images. Note: Not valid  when image conversion is GIF.
properties.name: jpegOptionsFormat

properties.description: The PNG compression level.
properties.name: level

properties.description: ignore object level image conversion settings.
properties.name: ignoreObjectConversionSettings

properties.description: The server path for image .
properties.name: serverPath

properties.description: The image extension on server.
properties.name: imageExtension

properties.description: If true, output local style override.
properties.name: preserveLocalOverride

properties.description: The file path of external cascading style sheets.
properties.name: externalStyleSheets

properties.description: The file path of external javascripts.
properties.name: javascripts

properties.description: If true, InDesign will generate cascade style sheet.
properties.name: generateCascadeStyleSheet

properties.description: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.
properties.name: properties

methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the HTMLExportPreference.
methods.name: toSource

methods.description: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.
methods.name: getElements

parameters.description: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
parameters.name: handler

parameters.description: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
parameters.name: handler
